attributes.action: stop foreign workers being allowed to claim family allowance for children who dont live in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: £35 million pounds of tax payers money as been claimed by foreign workers for there children who dont even live in this country , not only is this wide open for abuse , tax payers of this country expect our money to be spent a lot more wisely .

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop foreign workers being allowed to claim family allowance for children who dont live in this country."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20273


Prime Minister's Office
